attributes.action: immediately appoint Judge Ian Trigger to be Minister in Charge of Stopping Immigration to this country.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This man has said publicly what every other politician just does not have the balls to say.  Judge Trigger has skills and judgement this country needs to utilise if it is not to be swallowed up by the intransigence of politicians who suffer from a lack of commitment; honesty; integrity; compassion and probity and just 'don't get it' and, most pointedly, just don't give a sh1t about the country or its people anymore!

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
